body_html:
As @TimZaman mentioned, it does look like this might be possible to do manually in a pinch with:

  • subgraph.py
  • copy_with_input_replacements

but a real implementation of this feature request is still needed.
body_text:
As @TimZaman mentioned, it does look like this might be possible to do manually in a pinch with:

subgraph.py
copy_with_input_replacements

but a real implementation of this feature request is still needed.
body:
As @TimZaman mentioned, it does look like this might be possible to do manually in a pinch with:

- [subgraph.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/graph_editor/subgraph.py)
- [copy_with_input_replacements](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/graph_editor/copy_with_input_replacements)

but a real implementation of this feature request is still needed.
